thread.title: Very nice boutique hotel in great location
thread.title_full: Very nice boutique hotel in great location - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Clay C
title: Very nice boutique hotel in great location
text: Completely remodeled hotel. Perfect for our family of 3. If you've tried to find a hotel for 2 parents & 1 child, you know how difficult it can be in England (unless you want 3 people in one bed or 2 adults in a full size bed.) We had a king bed & a twin bed. The room wasn't large but very adequate. We really don't spend much time in the hotel except to sleep & shower. Beautifully decorated modern feel. The Soho location is perfect. Short walks to Chinatown & Leicester Square & theater district. Situated about 8 minute walk to subway stops. Easy access to Taxis, convenience store, restaurants, theaters. Soho is like a small Times Square area. Not as crowded or circus-like feel. But eclectic. We would definitely stay here again.
